content: शाखिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शाखा अस्त्यस्य इति] {@--1@} Having branches (<ab>fig.</ab> also). {@--2@} Branching, ramifying. {@--3@} Belonging to any branch or school (as of the Veda). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A tree; कुल्यांभोभिः पवनचपलैः शाखिनो धौतूलाः <ls>Ś. 1. 15.</ls> {@--2@} A Veda. {@--3@} A follower of any Vedic school or recension.
